package.name: pecl_http
package.description: * Building absolute URIs * RCF compliant HTTP redirects * RFC compliant HTTP date handling * Parsing of HTTP headers and responses * Caching by "Last-Modified" and/or ETag (with 'on the fly' option for ETag generation from buffered output) * Sending data/files/streams with (multiple) ranges support * Negotiating user preferred language/charset * Convenient request functions to HEAD/GET/POST if libcurl is available * HTTP auth hooks (Basic) * HTTPi, HTTPi_Response and HTTPi_Request (with libcurl) classes

release.notes: * added some compatibility checks for older libcurl versions * fixed some memory leaks * fixed a typo which made http_split_response() useless * fixed HTTPi_Request object destruction
